Cook for another 1 minute, stirring throughout.', 'Add the remaining chili ingredients. Cook at a gentle simmer, partially covered, for 20 minutes. Stir occasionally.', 'To make the cheese sauce, cover the cashews with boiling water and let them soak for at least 10 minutes, then drain.', 'Add the drained cashews and remaining sauce ingredients to a high-speed blender. Blend until smooth.', 'Add the blended mixture to a saucepan and heat through. Then set aside.', 'To make the salsa, combine the ingredients in a small food processor or chop finely and mix together in a bowl.', 'Assemble by placing the fries on a plate. Top with chilli.', 'Drizzle over the cheese sauce, salsa, and any other desired garnishes. Enjoy!']

Title: High Protein Lettuce Wraps with a Creamy Peanut Sauce
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable chopped pressed chickpea julienned bean garlic vermicelli noodle butter patted peanut butter sesame rice sambal oelek agave syrup sesame onion
Directions: ['Heat the oil in a sauté pan over medium-high heat. Add the green onion and garlic and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Then crumble in the tofu with your hands and add the chickpeas. Use the back of the wooden spatula or a fork to mash the chickpeas a bit.', 'While the tofu continues to cook, prepare the carrots and bell peppers.', 'Add the bell peppers, carrots, and black bean sauce to the pan. Stir and cook for 3 - 4 minutes, until the vegetables are tender but crunchy.', 'Add the rice noodles to a large bowl and pour boiling water over top. Set aside.', "Add all the sauce ingredients to a mason jar and mix. Add more water, if you'd prefer a thinner sauce.", 'Drain the rice noodles, rinse with warm water, and add to the pan. Toss to combine and let everything heat through. Remove from the stove.', 'To assemble, take a leaf of lettuce, top with the tofu-noodle mix, drizzle over the peanut sauce, and any other desired toppings. Enjoy!']

Title: Double Tomato Bruschetta with Balsamic Reduction
Parsed_Ingredients: quarter tomato chopped tomato chopped garlic onion tomato
Directions: ['In a bowl, combine the chopped tomatoes, basil, sun-dried tomatoes and oil, capers, garlic, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Set aside to allow the flavours to meld.', 'Make the balsamic reduction* by pouring the vinegar in a saucepan. Cook uncovered at a gentle boil until the volume reduces to about a quarter or third of the original volume, about 8 minutes. Stir often.', 'Brush both sides of the bread with the sun-dried tomato oil and toast on a frying pan on high heat, or in the oven on broil until the edges are golden.', 'Serve the bruschetta with the toasted bread, drizzle over a very small amount of the balsamic reduction, and enjoy!']

Title: Roasted Edamame: 2 Ways
Parsed_Ingredients: edamame curry onion miso paste maple syrup sambal oelek
Directions: ['Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Line a baking tray. Pour boiling water over the frozen edamame to thaw them out for a couple of minutes.', 'Drain and towel-dry the edamame.', 'Add half of the edamame to a bowl. Add all of the ingredients for the curry flavour, and toss to combine.', 'Add the miso paste, maple syrup, and sambal to another bowl. Mix until smooth.', 'Toss the remaining edamame in oil. Then coat with the miso-sambal mixture.', 'Transfer both edamame mixtures to the baking tray and spread them out.', 'Bake for 30 - 35 minutes, or until lightly golden, mixing once halfway. Enjoy on your favourite salad or simply as a snack!']

Title: Orange High-Energy Oat Bars
Parsed_Ingredients: pecan apricot rolled oat orange peanut butter maple syrup pure dairy chocolate flaked
Directions: ['Add the pecans to a pan on medium-high heat and toast for 3 - 5 minutes, or until lightly toasted and aromatic. Stir often.', 'Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Line a 10 x 7 inch (26 x 17 cm) baking dish with parchment paper.', 'Add the apricots and toasted pecans to a food processor and blitz into small chunks.', 'Transfer the mixture to a large bowl, along with the oats, almond flour, cinnamon, orange zest (save a bit for garnish!), and salt. Stir well.', 'Then add the peanut butter, maple syrup, and vanilla. Mix again.', 'Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking dish. Press down as firmly as possible, levelling it all out.', 'Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 25 - 30 minutes, or until the top is lightly golden. Then let cool for a few minutes before removing from the baking dish to cool completely.', 'Meanwhile, melt the chocolate in the microwave or on the stove, using a double boiler. Drizzle it over the bars.', 'Sprinkle on some sea salt and reserved orange zest. Cut into 8 squares or about 10 bars, and enjoy!']

Title: Creamy Avocado Dip
Parsed_Ingredients: garlic soy
Directions: ['Add all ingredients to a small food processor and blend until creamy*. Mix, and enjoy!']

Title: Cinnamon Mustard Dip
Parsed_Ingredients: vegan mayonnaise maple syrup
Directions: ['Add all of the ingredients to a bowl and mix to combine. Enjoy!']

Title: Oven-Roasted Sweet Potato Fries
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable onion dip avocado dip
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 430°F (220°C). Cut the sweet potatoes into ½ inch (1 cm) thick fries, cutting each piece in similar thicknesses so they cook evenly.', 'Optional step: soak in cold water for 5 minutes. Then drain and dry well using a clean kitchen cloth.', 'Transfer to a parchment-lined baking tray and toss in the cornstarch to coat. Then add the remaining ingredients and toss again.', 'Divide over two baking trays, leaving as much room between the fries as possible. If over-crowded on the tray, they steam rather than roast.', 'Bake for 28 - 30 minutes, or until golden, flipping once halfway. Serve with your favourite dip, and enjoy!']

Title: Creamy Coconut Chana Dal
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable chopped minced minced minced curry masala chana soaked vegetable soaked overnight full coconut milk chopped chopped lemon
Directions: ['Add oil to a large pot on high heat. When hot, add the onion and cook until lightly golden, about 5 minutes. Add splashes of water as needed to deglaze the pot.', 'Then add the garlic, ginger, and chili pepper and sauté for 3 more minutes.', 'Drop the heat to medium, and add the curry powder, turmeric, garam masala, and salt. Stir continuously for 30 - 60 seconds to toast the spices.', 'Add the water, drained chana dal, and bouillon. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer, and partially cover. Cook for 30 - 40 minutes, or until the dal is al dente*. Stir periodically.', 'Meanwhile, add the drained rice and water to a medium pot. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer, partially cover with a lid, and cook for 20 minutes. Then remove from the heat and leave covered.', 'Taste test the dal. When fully cooked through, add the coconut milk and bell peppers. Cook uncovered for 10 more minutes.', 'Then add the cherry tomatoes and cook for another 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Serve the dal with the rice, and garnish as desired. Enjoy!']

Title: Macaroni Chili
Parsed_Ingredients: wheat macaroni vegetable minced tomato tomato paste vegetable kidney bean soy veggie chopped chopped
Directions: ['Cook the macaroni according to the package directions, but decrease cooking time by 1 - 2 minutes. Once nearly al dente, drain.', 'Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large pot on medium-high heat and cook the onions and garlic for 3 - 5 minutes.', 'Add the diced tomatoes, and rinse out the can with water (about 400 mL) adding this to the pot as well, along with the tomato paste, bouillon cube, and spices. Bring to a boil.', 'Once bubbling, add the kidney beans, veggie ground, carrot, and bell pepper. Cook until the carrots have softed, about 5 minutes.', 'Lastly, add the drained noodles and spinach. Cook for another minute, or until the pasta is al dente. Enjoy!']

Title: Tofu Vietnamese Sub - Bánh Mì
Parsed_Ingredients: sriracha granulated sugar sesame vegetable julienned granulated sugar vegan mayonnaise sriracha hoisin
Directions: ['Gently squeeze the block of tofu to remove as much liquid as possible, then thinly cut into ¼ inch (½ cm) thick slices.', 'To a large shallow dish, add the garlic, soy sauce, sriracha, sugar, sesame oil, lime juice, and whisk. Then add the tofu to the marinade and gently toss to coat. Set aside.', 'To a mason jar, add the carrots, boiling water, vinegar, sugar, and salt. Screw on the lid and give it a gentle shake to dissolve the sugar. Let sit while preparing the rest of the recipe.', 'To a large pan on medium-high heat, add the oil and cook the tofu slices in a single layer for 3 - 5 minutes, or until golden. Do not disturb the tofu as they cook, as this can cause them to crumble.', 'Spoon the leftover marinade over the top of the tofu slices before giving it a flip to cook on the other side.', 'Spread some mayo and hot sauce inside each baguette. Layer on the tofu slices, pickled carrots, cucumber, chili pepper, and cilantro. Serve with hoisin on the side. Enjoy!']

Title: Potato Hash Cakes with Baked Marinated Tempeh
Parsed_Ingredients: maple syrup sriracha tempeh potato onion carrot flour garlic vegetable tomato spinach sriracha flaked
Directions: ['Mix together the soy sauce, maple syrup, and sriracha in a large, shallow bowl.', "Slice the tempeh into 2 mm thin slices. Transfer to the shallow dish and toss to coat. Let marinate for at least 20 minutes. Mix once or twice while it's marinating to re-coat.", 'Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Meanwhile, grate the potato, onion and carrot into a large bowl.', 'Add the remaining hash cake ingredients.', 'Use a ½ cup measure to scoop up the potato mixture. Flatten into ½ cm thick cakes on a parchment-lined baking tray.', 'On another lined tray, arrange the tempeh in a single layer and reserve any leftover marinade.', 'Bake both trays in the oven, on the middle and lower racks, for 10 minutes. Then flip both the potato cakes and tempeh slices.', 'Use any leftover marinade to drizzle on the second side of the tempeh. Rotate the position of the trays in the oven and bake for another 10 - 15 minutes, or until golden.', 'Meanwhile, heat the oil in a medium pan on medium-high heat. Add the cherry tomatoes and cook until the skins start to crack open, about 2 minutes.', 'Then add the crushed garlic and cook until fragrant and golden, about 3 - 4 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside.', 'Add the spinach to the now-empty pan. Stir often, and remove from the heat once fully wilted.', 'To serve, use a potato cake as the base, top with a few slices of baked tempeh, then the spinach and blistered tomatoes. Top with avocado slices, and enjoy!']

Title: Avocado Hummus
Parsed_Ingredients: avocado chickpea tahini garlic sesame
Directions: ['Add all the hummus ingredients to a food processor and blend until smooth.', 'Top with optional garnish, and serve.']

Title: Avocado Hummus Toast with Miso Mushroom and Kale Sauté
Parsed_Ingredients: avocado chickpea tahini garlic chive pita bread cremini minced chopped onion miso paste flaked onion
Directions: ['Add all the hummus ingredients to a food processor. Blend until smooth.', 'In a small bowl, combine the oil, chives, parsley, cumin, and salt. Then spread evenly over each pita.', 'Warm the bread in a large pan on high heat, seasoned side down, until crispy and golden, about 2 minutes. Transfer to a plate.', 'Returning the same pan to the heat, add the oil. When the oil is hot, sauté the mushrooms for 2 minutes.', 'Then add the garlic and continue to cook until most of the moisture has evaporated, about 5 - 8 min.', 'Add the kale and onion powder, and toss until wilted.', 'In a small bowl, add the miso paste and water. Whisk until no lumps remain. Pour this over the mushroom and kale mixture, stir, and then remove from the heat.', 'To assemble, top the bread generously with avocado hummus, and the mushroom mix. Add some sliced bell pepper, or any other desired toppings, and enjoy!']

Title: Simple Oatmeal Pancakes
Parsed_Ingredients: rolled oat soy applesauce maple syrup refined coconut pure coconut yogurt pomegranate chopped
Directions: ['In a food processor, blend the oatmeal into a flour. Alternatively, use store-bought oatmeal flour.', 'Combine all the pancake ingredients in a large bowl.', 'Preheat a large pan on medium-high heat with oil. When hot, spoon about ¼ cup of batter onto the pan for each pancake. Cook for about 2 minutes.', 'When the bottom becomes golden, flip and cook for another 2 minutes, or until lightly golden.', 'For a more balanced breakfast, enjoy these pancakes with some creamy nut butter drizzled overtop, fresh fruit, and creamy plant-based yogurt.']

Title: Ooey-Gooey Cinnamon Buns
Parsed_Ingredients: soy milk yeast flour granulated sugar refined coconut chopped refined coconut soy maple syrup powdered sugar vegan butter soy milk clear
Directions: ['Heat the milk in a saucepan until just steaming*. Do not let simmer! Remove from the heat, add the yeast, stir, and let sit for 5 minutes.', 'In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.', 'When the yeast mixture is foamy, add to the flour mixture along with the melted coconut oil. Mix together.', 'Then use your hands and knead for 3 - 4 minutes until smooth. Add a bit more flour if needed, the dough should be slightly sticky but not stick to the bowl. Cover with a damp cloth and let it rest in a warm place for 1 hour.', "Lightly grease a baking dish that's about 10½ x 8 inch (27 x 21 cm), or big enough to easily fit all the rolls.", 'In a small bowl, combine the brown sugar, pecans, and cinnamon. Set aside.', 'Transfer the dough onto a floured surface. Use a rolling pin to roll the dough into a ½ cm thick rectangle of 30 x 40 cm.', "Spread the coconut oil across the rolled-out dough. It looks like a lot, and that's okay!", 'Sprinkle the brown sugar and pecan mixture evenly overtop the rolled-out dough.', 'With the longest edge of the rectangular dough closest to you, begin to roll the dough.', 'Cut the rolled dough into 12 buns, about 1½ inches (3 cm) thick each. We did this by cutting the roll in half, then in half again, and then cutting each of those quarters into thirds.', 'Place each bun into the baking dish, then cover it with a damp cloth and let rest in a warm place for another hour.', 'While the buns are resting, mix the remaining milk with maple syrup. Set aside.', 'Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Bake buns in the centre rack of the oven for 10 minutes. Remove from the oven to spoon the sweetened milk mixture over the buns.', 'Return the cinnamon buns back to the oven to bake for an additional 20 - 25 minutes, or until the tops of the buns are golden.', 'While the buns are baking, whisk together the icing ingredients using an electric hand mixer. Add a splash more milk if a thinner consistency is preferred.', 'When the buns are removed from the oven, let them cool slightly before smearing the icing overtop. Enjoy!']

Title: Coconut Lemon Custard Tart
Parsed_Ingredients: digestive refined coconut silken tofu coconut granulated sugar pure berry stewed berry
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Using a small food processor or a rolling pin, crush the cookies into a crumb.', 'Mix the coconut oil with the crumbs.', 'Transfer the cookie mixture into a 6-inch (16 cm) spring form pan. Use the flat bottom of a cup to press the crumbs into a crust.', 'Add the filling ingredients to a blender. Blend until smooth, then pour into the crust. Tap the pan to remove bubbles.', 'Bake in the centre rack of the oven for 25 - 30 minutes, until the edges are lightly golden and the topped is cracked*.', 'Let cool at room temp for 30 minutes, then transfer to the fridge for at least 3 hours to set. Best if it can be let to cool overnight, although not necessary.', 'Decorate as desired, and enjoy!']

Title: Chocolate Chip Caramel Skillet Cookie
Parsed_Ingredients: granulated sugar coconut flaxseed vegan at granulated sugar pure flour dairy chocolate chip vegan ice cream
Directions: ['Add the sugar and water to a saucepan on medium-high heat. Bring to a gentle boil and stir so the sugar dissolves.', 'Then add the coconut cream. Continue to stir until the mixture starts to thicken slightly, about 8 minutes. Then remove it from the heat; it will continue to thicken as it cools.', 'Add the flaxseeds and water to a large bowl. Mix and let sit for 5 minutes to gel.', 'Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). To the flaxseed mixture, add the margarine, sugars, and vanilla, and mash together using a fork.', 'Add in the flour, baking powder, salt, and chocolate chips, and mix until just combined. Careful not to overmix.', 'Use some softened butter to grease a 10-inch (26 cm) cast iron skillet and spread ½ of the cookie batter on the bottom.', 'Cover with ¼ cup the caramel sauce, then dollop the remaining dough over the caramel and smooth out. Top with some more chocolate chips for decoration if desired.', 'Bake in the centre rack of the preheated oven for 30 - 35 minutes, or until the top is golden.', 'Best served warm from the oven. Drizzle over some more caramel, top with ice cream, and enjoy!']

Title: Peanut Butter Curry Soup
Parsed_Ingredients: minced minced curry vegetable chopped peanut butter full coconut milk multi
Directions: ['In a large pot over medium heat, add the oil, onions, garlic, and ginger. Cook for 3 minutes. Add splashes of water as needed to deglaze the pot.', 'Add the spices, stirring to toast for 30 - 60 seconds until fragrant.', 'Add the stock, sweet potatoes, banana, carrot, and peanut butter. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer, cover with a lid, and cook for 15 minutes.', 'Add the coconut milk, and blend using an immersion blender or standing blender. Heat through completely.', 'Serve with bread or croutons, and enjoy!']

Title: Homemade Crunchy Croutons
Parsed_Ingredients: wheat bread garlic onion
Directions: ['Slice or tear the bread into 1 cm cubes.', 'Add the bread, oil, garlic, herbs and spices to a large bowl and toss to combine.', 'For the pan-fried version: heat a bit more oil in a large pan on high heat. Add the coated bread and stir often, cooking for 5 minutes or until golden and crispy.', 'For the oven-baked version: preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Spread the coated bread onto a lined baking tray and bake for 7 - 10 minutes, mixing once halfway. Enjoy with your favourite soup or salad!']

Title: Roasted Vegetable Harvest Soup
Parsed_Ingredients: garlic butternut reserved quarter vegetable full coconut milk garlic onion
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Toss the vegetables with the oil and spices on a lined baking tray.', 'Spread out evenly, and bake for 30 minutes or until the squash and carrots can be easily pierced with a fork. Toss the vegetables once or twice while they are baking.', 'Meanwhile, clean off the butternut squash seeds.', 'Toss the seeds with oil and spices, and bake on another lined baking tray for 15 minutes, until slightly golden. Stir once halfway. Remove from the oven and allow to cool.', 'After the veggies have roasted, add them straight to a large pot on high heat along with the vegetable stock and coconut milk.', 'Blend using a immersion blender. Alternatively, it can be added to a standing blender in batches, and blended until smooth. Heat through and garnish with the seasoned seeds. Enjoy!']

Title: One-Pot Veggie Lentil Soup
Parsed_Ingredients: soaked at least vegetable minced curry masala vegetable lemon
Directions: ['Add the oil to a large pot on medium-high heat. Once hot, add the onions and cook for 5 minutes. Add splashes of water as needed to deglaze the pot.', 'Add the garlic and red chilli, cook for another 2 minutes.', 'Add the spices and cook for 30 - 60 seconds, stirring throughout.', 'Add the water, bouillon*, lentils, and potatoes. Bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer, partially covered for 5 minutes.', 'Add the carrots and cook for another 10 minutes.', 'Optionally, blend half of the soup using an immersion blender to make it more creamy. Then add the broccoli and cook until tender, about 3 minutes.', 'Adjust salt and pepper to your liking, and enjoy!']

Title: Borscht Soup
Parsed_Ingredients: apple onion carrot celery cabbage vegetable minced vegetable tomato paste pickle vegan cream
Directions: ['Shred the apple and all the veggies using the shredding disk of a food processor, or using a box grater.', 'Add the oil to a large pot on medium-high heat. When hot, add the garlic and all the shredded vegetables. Cook until soft, about 5 minutes.', 'Add all the remaining ingredients. Stir and cook, partially covered, at a simmer until the beets are soft, about 15 - 20 minutes.', 'Remove the bay leaves.', 'Serve and top with desired garnishes. Enjoy!']

Title: Green Pea Soup
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable minced pea edamame vegetable preferably soaked at least crouton
Directions: ['Heat the oil in a large pot on medium-high heat, then add the onions and garlic and sauté until lightly golden, about 5 minutes. Add splashes of water as needed to deglaze the pot.', 'Add the remaining ingredients, bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer, and partially cover with a lid. Let simmer for 15 minutes.', 'Remove the pot from the heat and use an immersion blender or standing blender to blend the soup until creamy.', 'Serve while hot, and top with crunchy croutons - enjoy!']

Title: One-Pot Tomato Lentil Pasta
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable minced chopped vegetable spaghetti noodle tomato based pasta lentil chopped tomato chopped spinach
Directions: ['Add the oil to a large pot on medium-high heat. When hot, add the garlic, onion, bouillon cube, Italian seasoning, and chili flakes. Cook for 2 - 3 minutes.', 'Then add the pasta, pasta sauce, boiling water, cherry tomatoes, lentils, olives, sun-dried tomatoes, and capers.', "Bring to a gentle simmer and partially cover with a lid. Cook for 10 - 15 minutes on medium heat until pasta is al dente. Stir every few minutes to ensure the pasta doesn't stick to the bottom of the pot.", 'When the pasta is al dente, add the spinach and stir, cooking for an additional minute.', 'Serve it generously into bowls, garnish, and enjoy!']

Title: One-Pot Creamy Rosé Pasta
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable minced vegetable penne pasta passata hummus nutritional yeast moon soy cream chopped artichoke chopped arugula
Directions: ['Add the oil to a large pot on medium-high heat. When hot, add the garlic, onion, bouillon, and chili flakes. Cook for 2 - 3 minutes.', 'Then add the uncooked pasta, passata sauce, water, hummus, and nutritional yeast to the pot.', 'Reduce heat to medium, partially cover with a lid, and cook for 10 minutes. Check on the pasta a few times and stir to prevent sticking to the bottom of the pot.', 'Add the zucchini, cooking cream, bell pepper, and artichokes. Cook until the pasta is al dente, about another 5 minutes.', 'Stir in the arugula when ready to serve. Garnish as desired, and enjoy!']

Title: One-Pot Creamy Mushroom Pasta
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable chopped minced minced vegetable full coconut milk button oyster fusilli pasta tomato chopped nutritional yeast spinach lemon
Directions: ['Add the oil to a large pot on high heat. When hot, add the shallots, garlic, and chili, and sauté until lightly golden, about 3 minutes.', 'Add all of the remaining ingredients to the pot, except for the spinach, and bring to a boil, then reduce to a simmer. Cook for 12 - 15 minutes, partially covered, stirring occasionally to prevent burning.', 'When the pasta is al dente, remove from the heat and add the spinach. Stir until the spinach is wilted.', 'Squeeze over some lemon juice and sprinkle on thinly sliced basil leaves if desired. Enjoy!']

Title: Beetroot Latte
Parsed_Ingredients: soy beet medjool pit pure maple syrup brewed espresso
Directions: ['Combine the soy milk, beet, dates, and vanilla extract in a high-powered blender until smooth and creamy.', "Pour this mixture straight into a saucepan on medium-high heat. If your blender isn't very powerful, or if you don't like small fibres to remain in your drink, strain the mixture through a sieve while pouring it into the saucepan.", 'Add the cinnamon stick and maple syrup. Let the mixture heat up, stirring throughout to prevent burning. Let simmer for about 3 minutes, then remove the cinnamon stick.', 'Pour into mugs and optionally add a shot of espresso. Stir, and enjoy!']

Title: Golden Milk
Parsed_Ingredients: soy full coconut milk pure medjool pit maple syrup brewed espresso
Directions: ['Add all ingredients to a high-speed blender* and blend on high until smooth.', "Pour this mixture straight into a saucepan. If your blender isn't very powerful, or if you don't like small fibres to remain in your drink, strain the mixture first when pouring it into the saucepan.", "Bring to a gentle simmer on medium-high heat, stirring throughout. Taste test and add maple syrup if you'd prefer the drink sweeter. When warmed through, remove from the heat.", 'To turn it into a turmeric latte, add some brewed espresso to your cups if desired. Pour the golden milk into the cups, and enjoy!']

Title: Peanut Butter Caramel Latte
Parsed_Ingredients: soy cashew medjool pit peanut butter brewed espresso pure
Directions: ['Add all of the ingredients together to a high-speed blender. Blend until smooth.', 'Pour into a saucepan on medium-high heat and stir continuously to prevent burning until heated through. If you prefer a thinner consistency, add some more plant milk.', 'Pour into your favourite mugs, add maple syrup if desired for more sweetness, and enjoy!']

Title: Mulled Spiced Apple Cider
Parsed_Ingredients: apple cracked cranberry
Directions: ['Place all of the ingredients in a large pot and bring to a boil.', 'Reduce the heat to a simmer, partially cover, and let the flavours infuse for 20 - 30 minutes.', 'Serve warm. Enjoy!']

Title: Chai Hot Chocolate
Parsed_Ingredients: soy dairy chopped dutch processed granulated sugar cracked chocolate shaving vegan whipped cream
Directions: ['Add all of the ingredients to a saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to a gentle simmer, stirring throughout to avoid burning.', 'When hot, pour through a sieve and serve in your favourite mugs.', 'Top with whipped cream if desired. Enjoy!']

Title: Vegan Mac & 'Cheese'
Parsed_Ingredients: cashew chopped chopped soy nutritional yeast apple onion macaroni pasta panko vegan
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (200°C). Add the cashews to a bowl and cover with boiling water. Let sit for 10 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, chop all the vegetables.', 'Add 1 inch (2 cm) of water to a large pot and bring it to a simmer. Add a steamer basket with the potatoes, carrots, onion and garlic*. Cover the pot and let the veggies steam for 10 - 15 minutes, or until tender.', "When the vegetables are soft, drain and add to a blender, together with the drained cashews, and all of the remaining 'cheese' sauce ingredients.", 'Fill the large pot with water, add the pasta, and cook according to the package instructions. In the last 3 minutes of cooking, add in the broccoli florets. When the pasta is al dente, drain.', 'Add the cooked pasta, broccoli, and sauce to a large baking dish. Toss together.', 'In a small bowl, mix together the breadcrumbs, melted butter and smoked paprika powder.', 'Top the mac and cheese with the breadcrumbs and place in the oven for 20 minutes, until the top is golden and crispy.', 'Serve with some fresh parsley on top for garnish if desired, and enjoy!']

Title: Mushroom & Rice Burger
Parsed_Ingredients: flaxseed vegetable minced button minced minced lentil rice nutritional yeast burger bun arugula sriracha mayo pickled jalapeno
Directions: ['Add the ground flaxseeds and water to a large bowl, mix, and set aside.', 'Add the oil to a sauté pan on high heat. When hot, add the onions and garlic and sauté until lightly golden, about 5 minutes.', 'Then add the mushroom and walnuts, and cook until most of the moisture has evaporated, which takes about 5 - 8 minutes.', 'Add the soy sauce, cumin, and coriander and continue to cook until all the moisture is evaporated. Remove the pan from the heat.', 'Add the lentils to the same bowl as the flaxseeds and mash as best you can using an immersion blender, potato masher, or fork.', 'Transfer the cooked mushroom mixture to the bowl, along with the remaining patty ingredients. Using your hands, mix well and then form into burger patties.', 'Heat up a bit of oil in a large pan on medium heat. Cook the patties until golden on each side, about 2 - 3 minutes per side.', 'When the patties are ready, assemble your burger, and enjoy!']

Title: Mexican Pizza
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable soy veggie mexican ready made pizza tomato paste pickled soy yogurt vegan mayonnaise homemade pizza dough
Directions: ['Add the oil to a small pan on high heat. When hot, add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes.', 'Then add the veggie ground, spice mix, and water. Cook for another 2 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Lightly brush the top of the pizza crusts with some (optional) oil, then spread over the tomato paste.', 'Divide the veggie ground mixture over the pizzas, and add the bell pepper, onion, corn, jalapeños, and tomatoes. Bake in the centre rack of the oven for 12 - 15 minutes, or until the crust is lightly golden.', 'Meanwhile, make cilantro sauce by mixing the ingredients in a small bowl.', 'When the pizza is done, top it with dollops of the yogurt sauce, some sliced avocado, and sliced green onions. Enjoy!']

Title: Tropical Mango Coconut Overnight Oats
Parsed_Ingredients: chopped rolled oat coconut milk chia butter maple syrup pure coconut yogurt butter
Directions: ['Add all the ingredients to a mason jar or airtight container.', 'Mix to combine. Add a lid onto the container, and let sit overnight in the fridge.', 'The next morning, add your desired toppings and enjoy!']

Title: Peanut Butter & Jelly Overnight Oats
Parsed_Ingredients: rolled oat soy peanut butter chia berry coconut yogurt berry peanut
Directions: ['Add the oats, milk, peanut butter, chia seeds, and cinnamon to a mason jar or airtight container. Mix to combine.', 'Then add the frozen berries, and gently mix again. Seal and let sit overnight in the fridge.', 'The next morning, add your desired toppings and enjoy!']

Title: Golden Overnight Couscous
Parsed_Ingredients: coconut chopped tahini maple syrup orange coconut pomegranate pistachio
Directions: ['Combine all of the overnight couscous ingredients in a mason jar. Cover and let sit overnight in the fridge.', 'The next morning, add any desired toppings. Enjoy!']

Title: Almond Chocolate Overnight Oats
Parsed_Ingredients: rolled oat soy butter flaxseed chopped dairy chocolate raspberry
Directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a mason jar or airtight container and let sit overnight in the fridge.', 'The next morning, serve with fruit and any other desired toppings. Enjoy!']

Title: Vegan 'Nutella' Overnight Oats
Parsed_Ingredients: rolled oat soy dutch processed flaxseed hazelnut butter chopped dairy chocolate flaked coconut yogurt strawberry hazelnut butter
Directions: ['Combine all the ingredients in a mason jar or airtight container and let sit overnight in the fridge.', 'The next morning, add your desired toppings. Enjoy!']

Title: Vegan Pad Thai
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable rice noodle vegetable minced minced pickled radish julienned julienned cabbage paste granulated sugar rice sriracha bean sprout lime peanut
Directions: ['To a large pan on high heat, add the oil. When hot, add the tofu and cook until lightly crispy on all sides*, about 8 minutes. Then transfer to a bowl.', 'Add the rice noodles to a large bowl and cover with boiling water. Let sit to soften, and drain when 1 - 2 minutes before al dente. Rinse under cold water.', 'To a sauté pan, add the oil. When hot, add the garlic, shallots, green onions, chili, and pickled radish. Cook for 5 - 8 minutes.', 'Then add the carrot, bell pepper, and cabbage and cook for 5 more minutes.', 'Add the soy sauce, tamarind paste, sugar, vinegar, sriracha, and lime juice. Stir.', 'Add the rice noodles to the pan, and toss to combine. Cook until everything is warmed through and the noodles are fully cooked.', 'Add the bean sprouts and tofu to the pan, and toss to coat.', 'Serve while hot, top with desired garnishes, and enjoy!']

Title: Nectarine Salsa
Parsed_Ingredients: chopped chopped chopped minced minced ripped baked tortilla chip tortilla chip
Directions: ['Add all of the ingredients to a medium bowl. Stir to combine, and enjoy!']

Title: Mango Spinach Smoothie
Parsed_Ingredients: mango spinach soy soy milk flaxseed vegan granola fruit
Directions: ['Add all of the ingredients to a high-speed blender.', 'Blend on high until smooth. Pour into tall glasses or into bowls to sprinkle overtop your favourite toppings. Enjoy!']

Title: Immune Booster Smoothie
Parsed_Ingredients: banana soy spinach raspberry coconut yogurt peanut butter berry coconut vegan granola
Directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a high-speed blender and blend on high until smooth.', 'Pour into bowls and top with desired toppings. Alternatively, pour into a tall bottle and take with you on-the-go!']

Title: Mocha Smoothie
Parsed_Ingredients: banana oat zucchini cashew medjool pit dutch processed brewed espresso pure vegan granola raspberry
Directions: ['Combine all ingredients in a high-speed blender and blend on high until smooth.', 'Pour into bowls and top with desired toppings.']

Title: Pink Sunrise Smoothie
Parsed_Ingredients: coconut milk strawberry raspberry chopped zucchini cashew
Directions: ['Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Serve and enjoy immediately.']

Title: Coconut Whip
Parsed_Ingredients: coconut powdered sugar pure
Directions: ['Place the coconut milk can upside-down in the refrigerator for at least 5 hours, but best if left in the fridge overnight to allow the liquid to separate from the fat. Refrigerate a large bowl together with the whisks of your electric hand mixer for at least 10 minutes to cool.', 'Gently turn the can back right-side-up, and open the can. Pour out the liquid layer on the top, and save this for a future smoothie or curry. Using a spoon, scoop out the solid white coconut fat into a large bowl.', 'Whip the coconut cream for 3 - 4 minutes.', 'Then add in the icing sugar and vanilla, and whip again for an additional minute.', 'Use the coconut whip to top brownies, fruit crumbles, watermelon pizza, or as a topping on your favourite hot chocolate*.']

Title: Vegetable Noodle Stir-Fry with Peanut Lime Sauce

Directions: ['Cook the noodles according to the package instructions.', 'Add the oil to a large pan on medium-high heat. When hot, add the shallots and garlic. Mix.', 'When the noodles are cooked, drain and add to the pan of vegetables. Pour the sauce mixture on top and toss to combine.', 'Serve with the roasted cashews and garnish as desired. Enjoy!']

Title: Mushroom & Chickpea Coconut Curry
Parsed_Ingredients: rice vegetable chopped minced chickpea button curry full coconut milk spinach
Directions: ['Cook the rice according to the package instructions.', 'Meanwhile, add the oil, onion, garlic, and ginger to a large pot on high heat and sauté for 3 minutes. Add splashes of water as needed to deglaze the pot.', 'Add the chickpeas and mushrooms to the pot and cook for 5 minutes.', 'Add the curry and paprika powder and sauté for one minute longer.', 'Add the coconut milk, bell pepper, salt, and pepper and cook for another 5 minutes.', 'Add the spinach and tomatoes at the end, and stir. When the spinach has wilted, remove from heat.', 'Serve the curry with the rice, squeeze over some lemon, and enjoy!']

Title: Quinoa Salad with Roasted Garlic Dressing
Parsed_Ingredients: garlic quinoa chopped chopped chopped chopped kalamata chopped chickpea chopped tahini onion
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Cut the top ½ cm off the head of garlic to expose the cloves, and place it on a baking tray. Transfer to a large bowl, along with the cooked quinoa and chickpeas. Toss to combine.', 'Remove the roasted cloves of garlic from the skin and place in a bowl, mash with a fork, and then add the remaining dressing ingredients. Stir.', 'Pour dressing over the salad and toss. Top with the roasted almonds, and enjoy!']

Title: Apple, Rhubarb & Ginger Cobbler
Parsed_Ingredients: rhubarb minced granulated sugar five flour granulated sugar vegan chilled soy yogurt pure powdered sugar vegan ice cream
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease a 12 x 8 inch (30 x 20 cm) baking dish with some melted butter or coconut oil.', 'Combine the ingredients for the fruit base in a large bowl.', 'Transfer the fruit to the baking dish, cover, and bake for 15 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, prepare the biscuit topping by combining the dry ingredients in a bowl.', 'Cut the butter into the dry mixture until the butter pieces are roughly pea-sized.', 'Add the remaining biscuit ingredients and combine to form a dough.', 'Pat the dough to ½ inch (1 cm) thickness and cut rounds using a cookie cutter.', 'Place the biscuits over the roasted fruit and dot any remaining dough between the pieces.', 'Return the baking dish to the oven and bake for 30 - 35 minutes, or until the top of the biscuits are golden.', 'Serve with powdered sugar or ice cream. Enjoy!']

Title: Homemade Mexican Seasoning
Parsed_Ingredients: garlic onion
Directions: ['Mix all the ingredients together in a jar. Seal until ready to use.']

Title: Quick Guacamole

Directions: ['Mash the avocado in a bowl, then add the remaining ingredients and stir to combine.', 'Serve on salad bowls, tacos, burritos, or enjoy with tortilla chips as a dip!']

Title: Lentil Taco Salad

Directions: ['Add all the ingredients for the spiced lentil walnuts to a bowl. Mix and set aside.', 'Add all the salad base ingredients to a large bowl. Toss and set aside.', 'Add all the cashew lime cream ingredients to a small food processor or blender. Set aside.', 'To assemble, add the salad base to the bottom of your bowl. Top with the lentil-walnut mixture, guacamole, salsa, and cashew cream. Title: Mashed Chickpea & Dill Sandwich
Parsed_Ingredients: chickpea minced minced vegan chopped pickle sunflower chopped chopped multi bread butter lettuce pickled onion
Directions: ['In a large bowl, mash the chickpeas with a potato masher or fork until flakey.', 'Add the remaining chickpea mash ingredients to the bowl and mix to combine.', 'Serve with your favourite sandwich fillings. Alternatively, serve as a snack with crackers, veggies, or scooped onto a salad. Enjoy!']

Title: Fresh Salad Rolls with a Creamy Peanut Hoisin Sauce
Parsed_Ingredients: vermicelli noodle edamame rice paper sheet julienned julienned cabbage peanut butter hoisin
Directions: ['Add the rice noodles and edamame into separate bowls. Pour plenty of boiling water over each. Set aside for 5 minutes, then drain.', 'Meanwhile, add the sauce ingredients to a small bowl and mix. Add a bit more water if a thinner consistency is desired.', 'In a large shallow dish, soak 1 sheet of rice paper in lukewarm water for 5 seconds. Avoid over-soaking to prevent tearing when rolling.', 'Let the excess water drip off the paper, then transfer the sheet to a large plate. In a line across the centre, add some rice noodles, edamame, and veggies.', 'Wrap the salad roll like you would a burrito: folding in the sides, then tucking and rolling. Cut in half using a sharp knife*.', 'Serve the rolls with the peanut sauce or with a sweet chili sauce, and enjoy!']

Title: Ranch Flavoured Roasted Chickpeas
Parsed_Ingredients: chickpea vegetable nutritional yeast chive garlic onion
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Combine all the ingredients in a small bowl.', 'Spread the seasoned chickpeas onto a lined baking tray. Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 30 - 35 minutes*, or until golden. Mix once halfway.', 'Remove from oven and let cool. Enjoy on salads, soups, or snack away on them as-is. Enjoy!']

Title: Ranch Roasted Potato Wedges
Parsed_Ingredients: potato vegetable nutritional yeast chive garlic onion sriracha mayo
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 390°F (200°C). Cut the potatoes in half lengthwise, then cut into wedges about ½ inch (1 cm) thick.', 'Transfer to a bowl. Add all the remaining ingredients and toss to coat.', 'Spread the potatoes out in a single layer* over one or two lined baking trays.', 'Bake for 30 - 40 minutes, or until golden. Give the potatoes a flip once at the halfway point. Enjoy!']

Title: Vegan Ranch Mayo Dip
Parsed_Ingredients: vegan mayonnaise nutritional yeast chive garlic onion potato
Directions: ['Combine all the ingredients in a bowl and stir until combined. Serve and enjoy!']

Title: 2-Minute Chocolate Nut Spread
Parsed_Ingredients: butter dutch processed maple syrup soy milk
Directions: ['Mix all the ingredients in a small bowl, and enjoy as a spread on toast, or as a dip for fresh fruit.']

Title: Frozen Yogurt Covered Blueberries
Parsed_Ingredients: soy
Directions: ['Gently mix the washed blueberries and yogurt together in a bowl.', 'Using a fork, drop the yogurt-covered berries one by one in a single layer* onto a parchment-lined baking tray. Place in the freezer for 30 - 60 minutes, or until the yogurt coating looks mostly frozen.', 'Peel the berries off the parchment paper and transfer them to an airtight container. Enjoy immediately, or return to the freezer to store until ready to enjoy.']

Title: Watermelon Pizza
Parsed_Ingredients: watermelon coconut berry pumpkin coconut
Directions: ['Wash the watermelon and cut into 1 inch (2 cm) thick rounds.', 'Top each round with a couple of scoops of yogurt, and spread it so that it almost reaches the rind.', 'Cut into slices and top with fruits and other desired toppings. Enjoy!']

Title: Roasted Potato Wedges
Parsed_Ingredients: potato vegetable onion garlic vegan ranch mayo dip sriracha mayo
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Cut the potatoes in half lengthwise, then cut into wedges about ½ inch (1 cm) thick.', 'Transfer the potatoes to a large bowl. Drizzle with the oil, paprika, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper and mix to coat.', "Spread the potatoes out in a single layer, ideally over two lined baking trays. Try to not overcrowd the tray, as this won't allow the potatoes to crispen up sufficiently in the oven.", 'Bake in the centre rack of the oven for 25 - 35 minutes, or until golden, stopping to give the potatoes a flip once halfway.', 'Serve with your favourite dip(s). Enjoy!']

Title: Rhubarb & Raspberry Almond Tart
Parsed_Ingredients: rhubarb granulated sugar raspberry jam digestive cooky medjool pit refined coconut pure flaxseed soy milk flour granulated sugar margarine flour pure powdered sugar
Directions: ['Preheat the oven the 350°F (180°C). Meanwhile, mix the flaxseeds and milk in a small bowl and set aside to gel.', 'Toss rhubarb pieces with sugar. Spread over a lined baking tray and roast for 10 minutes.', 'Blend the ingredients for the crust in a food processor. The mixture should hold together when pressed between your fingers.', 'Transfer the crust mixture to a 10-inch (22 cm) tart pan. Press firmly into the pan to create the crust.', 'In the now empty food processor, add the frangipane ingredients. Blend into a paste.', 'Spread the raspberry jam over the crust.', 'Dollop the frangipane over the jam layer and smooth out into an even layer.', 'Add the roasted rhubarb pieces to the top of the tart. Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 20 - 25 minutes, or until the crust turns golden along the edges.', 'Remove from the oven, and let cool before serving. Dust with powdered sugar if desired, and enjoy!']

Title: White Asparagus & Potato Soup
Parsed_Ingredients: asparagus chopped minced vegetable hazelnut chive crouton
Directions: ['Peel the outer layer of the asparagus with a vegetable peeler. Trim off the ends to remove any tough, woody bits.', 'Place the asparagus and water in a large pot on medium-high heat. Cook partially covered at a gentle simmer for 8 - 10 minutes.', 'Add the oil to a large pot on medium-high heat. When hot, add the onion, cooking until lightly golden.', 'Scoop out the cooked asparagus and transfer to a cutting board. Reserve the cooking liquid. Chop the asparagus into bite-sized pieces and reserve the tips for garnish.', 'Add the garlic and cook for another minute, until fragrant.', 'Add the remaining ingredients, including the asparagus and reserved water*. Cook partially covered for 15 minutes.', 'Once the potatoes are cooked through, use an immersion blender or standing blender to purée the soup.', 'Pour the hot soup into your desired bowls. Serve with the reserved asparagus tips and any desired garnish. Enjoy!']

Title: Frozen Yogurt Breakfast Bars
Parsed_Ingredients: berry medjool pit rolled oat butter flaxseed soy
Directions: ['Place the frozen berries in a saucepan on medium heat, stirring occasionally. The fruits will begin to thaw and release their juices. When heated through, remove from the heat.', 'In a food processor, blend the dates until smooth.', 'Add the oats, almond butter, ground flaxseed, and cinnamon. Blend again until well combined.', 'Transfer the mix to a lined 11 x 7 inch (18 x 28cm) baking dish and press firmly into the base of the dish. The more firmly you press, the better the bars will hold together.', 'Top with the yogurt and spread out evenly.', 'Dot the yogurt with the stewed berries and use a butter knife to swirl.', 'Place into the freezer and let freeze for 1 - 2 hours, or until the bars are solid enough to cut.', 'When removed from the freezer, cut into squares or bars of the desired size.', 'Let thaw for 3 - 5 minutes and enjoy!']

Title: Refreshing Ginger Mint Lemonade
Parsed_Ingredients: desired ice agave
Directions: ['Gather the grated ginger into your hands and squeeze over a pitcher to extract the juice*. Discard the pulp. For a more subtle ginger flavour, simply cut the ginger into slices and add it to the pitcher, instead of grating and squeezing.', 'Add the mint to the pitcher, and use a wooden spatula or wooden tamper to give the mint a mash. Stir, add more syrup if the drink tastes too tart, and serve immediately. Cheers!']

Title: Samosa Sweet Potato Breakfast Wraps with Tofu Scramble
Parsed_Ingredients: vegetable pea fenugreek vegetable nutritional yeast garlic tortilla
Directions: ['Steam the sweet potatoes in a medium pot using a steamer basket over high heat for 10-15 minutes, or until easily pierced with a fork.', 'Meanwhile, for the tofu scramble, heat the oil in a medium pan over medium heat. Title: Baked Fruit Crumble - Three Ways
Parsed_Ingredients: berry rolled oat refined coconut sugar chopped pecan vegan ice cream coconut yogurt
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F). If using larger berries, such as strawberries, first slice*. Top with yogurt, ice cream, or whip. Enjoy!']

Title: Tropical Coconut Popsicles
Parsed_Ingredients: full coconut milk pineapple raspberry
Directions: ['To a medium bowl or large pitcher, add the coconut milk, pineapple juice, and lime juice. Mix.', 'Pour this mixture into popsicle moulds until each well is about 80% full*. Place the mould into the freezer for 1 - 2 hours.', 'Meanwhile, heat the frozen berries in a saucepan on medium heat for 3 - 5 minutes, or until fully thawed. Mash slightly to release some of the juices. Alternatively, thaw in the microwave. Set aside to cool.', 'After the 1 - 2 hours is up, remove the mold from the freezer and spoon the raspberry mixture onto the popsicles.', 'Use a popsicle stick to gently push the raspberries into the popsicle to create a swirl pattern. Then position the sticks in the center of the mould and return to the freezer*. Let freeze completely.', 'When you want to remove a popsicle, run the bottom of the mould under hot water to help release the popsicle. Enjoy!']

Title: Ultra Fudgy Sea Salt Caramel Brownies
Parsed_Ingredients: medjool pit refined coconut dutch processed pecan chopped dairy chocolate flaked
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a food processor*, blend the dates, coconut oil, cocoa powder, and water until smooth.', 'Add the roasted pecans, chocolate, and a pinch of salt. Gently press these in to secure them.', 'Let cool before cutting. These brownies are fudgiest if kept in the fridge. Enjoy!']

Title: Stewed Berries

Directions: ['Stovetop directions: place the frozen fruit in a saucepan on medium heat, stirring occasionally. The fruits will begin to thaw and release their juices. Title: Homemade Almond Butter
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Title: Falafel Wraps with Roasted Garlic Mayo

Title: Perfect Roasted Garlic

Title: Roasted Garlic, Potato & Arugula Pizza

Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Title: BTLT: BBQ Tempeh Lettuce & Tomato Sandwich

Title: To-Go Miso Noodle Soup

Title: Thai Sweet Potato & Chickpea Green Curry

Title: Rainbow Veggie Sushi Rolls

Directions: ['Rinse the rice until it runs clear. Cook the rice according to the package instructions. Title: Thai Red Curry Noodle Soup with Crispy Tofu

Title: Tempeh Tacos with Cashew Lime Cream

Title: Speedy Pea & Basil Pesto Pasta

Title: Sugar-Free Fudgy Two-Bite Brownies

Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). In a large bowl, combine the ground flaxseeds and milk. Title: Quick Homemade Tahini

Directions: ["Toast the sesame seeds in a large pan on medium heat until lightly golden*. Stir constantly. Transfer to a container and enjoy!']

Title: Green Pea, Edamame & Mint Dip

Title: Vibrant Roasted Beetroot Hummus

Set aside to cool.', 'Add all the ingredients to a food processor and blend until smooth. Taste test and adjust to the lemon, tahini, olive oil, and salt to your liking.', 'Plate, garnish, and enjoy!']

Title: Golden Vegan Hot Chocolate

Directions: ['Add all the ingredients to a blender*, and blend until smooth.', 'Transfer to a saucepan and bring to a gentle simmer over medium-high heat. Stir continuously to prevent scorching the milk.', 'When heated through, remove from heat, transfer into your desired cups and enjoy!']

Title: Zucchini Rolls with Vegan Ricotta Cheese

Directions: ['Soak the cashews in boiling water for 10 minutes to soften.', 'Meanwhile, use a vegetable peeler to peel the zucchini into long strips.', 'Add the spinach to a large pan on medium-high heat, stirring for 1 - 2 minutes. Garnish, and enjoy!']

Title: Creamy & Rich London Fog

Directions: ['To a saucepan on medium heat, add the milk, tea, maple syrup, and cinnamon. Whisk continuously until the milk starts to simmer, then stir in the vanilla and remove from the heat.', 'Cover and allow to steep for 1 - 2 minutes further for a stronger tea flavour. Then strain the tea into mugs and enjoy!']

Title: One-Pot Lasagna Soup

When al dente, after about 3 - 5 minutes, drain, rinse, and divide between the serving bowls.', 'To serve, ladle the veggies and broth over the noodles. Serve with the cooked tofu and load with desired toppings. Serve immediately and enjoy while hot!']

Title: Refreshing Strawberry & Pineapple Mint Smoothie
Parsed_Ingredients: coconut strawberry pineapple
Directions: ['Place all ingredients in a blender, and blend until smooth. Serve immediately and enjoy!']

Title: Creamy Beetroot & Sweet Potato Soup
Parsed_Ingredients: chopped vegetable full coconut milk crouton super
Directions: ['Add the oil and onions to a large pot on high heat and cook for 5 - 7 minutes, or until caramelized. Add splashes of water as needed to deglaze the pan.', 'Add the garlic and stir until golden, about 2 minutes.', 'Then sprinkle in the spices and toast for 30 seconds, stirring throughout.', 'Add the veggies, bouillon, and water. Bring to a boil, reduce to a simmer, partially cover, and cook for 25 - 30 minutes.', 'Once the potatoes and beetroots are soft, add the coconut milk and purée using an immersion blender or standing blender.', 'Serve with desired garnishes. Enjoy!']

Title: Healthiest Ever Granola
Parsed_Ingredients: medjool pit tahini rolled oat chopped chopped raisin cranberry sunflower pumpkin coconut
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 300°F (150°C). Add the dates, tahini, and water to a small food processor and blend on high until creamy.', 'Add all the remaining ingredients to a large bowl and mix.', 'Add the date mixture to the bowl and mix to combine.', 'Spread the granola evenly on lined baking tray. Bake on the centre rack of the oven for 25 - 30 minutes, stopping one or two times to stir to prevent burning and to ensure the granola cooks evenly.', 'When the granola is lightly golden, remove from the oven and let cool on the baking tray. When fully cooled, transfer to an airtight container or large glass storage jar. Enjoy!']

Title: One-Bowl Double Chocolate Banana Muffins
Parsed_Ingredients: flaxseed banana granulated sugar applesauce refined coconut pure dutch processed flour dairy topping
Directions: ['Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C), and lightly grease or line the inside of a muffin tin.', 'To a large bowl, add the ground flaxseeds and water, mix, and allow to sit for 5 minutes to gel.', 'Then add the bananas and mash until very well combined.', 'Whisk in the sugar, applesauce, coconut oil, and vanilla.', 'Add the cocoa powder, baking soda, baking powder, and salt, and mix again.', 'Then add the flour, mixing until just combined. Some streaks remaining are okay. Gently fold in the chocolate. Be careful not to over-mix', 'Evenly divide the batter into the prepared muffin tin. Top each muffin with extra chocolate chunks, if desired, and bake on the middle rack of the oven for about 15 - 20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the centre comes out clean.', 'Allow the muffins to cool in the tin for a few minutes before transferring them to a cooling rack to cool completely. Enjoy!']

Title: Balsamic & Basil Bruschetta
Parsed_Ingredients: minced minced garlic
Directions: ['Add all of the ingredients to a medium bowl and gently toss until combined.', 'Although the dish can be enjoyed immediately, it’s best to cover the tomatoes and let them sit in the fridge for at least 2 hours to allow the flavours to meld, if possible.', 'Serve fresh on toasted bread, or even toast together with the bread in the oven for a warm bruschetta. Garnish with fresh basil if desired. Enjoy!']

Title: Sun-Dried Tomato & White Bean Dip
Parsed_Ingredients: chopped minced cannellini bean tomato nutritional yeast chopped
Directions: ['Add the oil and onion to a medium pan on high heat. Cook for 4 minutes, or until golden. Then add the garlic and cook for another couple of minutes, until fragrant.', 'Add the cooked onion, garlic, and all remaining ingredients, excluding the chives, to a food processor and blend until smooth. Then stir in the chives by hand.', 'Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight to allow the flavours to meld. Drizzle with olive oil and a bit of balsamic vinegar before serving, if desired. Enjoy!']

Title: Black & Green Olive Tapenade
Parsed_Ingredients: kalamata pit pit tomato garlic walnut
Directions: ['Finely mince the olives, tomatoes, capers, garlic, basil, and walnuts. Transfer to a medium bowl.', 'Add the remaining ingredients and toss to combine.', 'This tapenade can be enjoyed immediately, but ideally, cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight to allow the flavours to meld. Enjoy!']

Title: Strawberry Mango Salsa with Baked Pita Chips
Parsed_Ingredients: vegan butter pita bread sugar chopped chopped minced chopped onion minced agave syrup
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 400°F (210°C). Spread the butter evenly onto the pita rounds, then cut each pita into eight equally-sized wedges.', 'In a small bowl, stir together the sugar and cinnamon. Sprinkle onto the pita wedges and bake on a baking tray in the oven for 7 minutes, or until crisped to your liking.', 'To a medium bowl, add all of the salsa ingredients and mix.', 'Serve the salsa with the pita chips and enjoy!']

Title: Easy Chunky Guacamole
Parsed_Ingredients: avocado minced chopped chopped baked tortilla chip
Directions: ['To a large bowl, add the avocados, lime juice, garlic, and spices. Mash the avocados, leaving some chunks if a textured consistency is preferred.', 'Gently stir in the onion, tomato*, and chives. Garnish and serve with tortilla chips or fresh veggies, or enjoy in sandwiches or wraps!']

Title: Easy Berry Chia Seed Jam
Parsed_Ingredients: blueberry chia apple
Directions: ['Thaw the berries in a saucepan on medium heat*. When softened, mash with a fork or spatula allowing some chunks to remain.', 'Then stir in the chia seeds and juice. Remove from the heat and let sit at room temperature for 30 minutes for the chia seeds to gel, stirring once halfway.', 'Transfer to your jar, and enjoy on toast, on oatmeal, in breakfast parfaits, and more!']

Title: Muhammara - Roasted Red Pepper & Walnut Spread
Parsed_Ingredients: walnut pomegranate molasses garlic agave syrup pomegranate pita bread lemon
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 450°F (230°C). Toss the bell peppers and oil on a lined baking tray and roast for 20 minutes. Rotate once halfway to ensure even cooking.', 'Then add the raw walnuts to the baking tray and continue to roast for another 5 - 6 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool. Once cool enough to handle, pull the skin off of the bell peppers.', 'Place all the ingredients, except for the walnuts, in a food processor and blend until smooth. Then add the walnuts and blend only momentarily so the walnuts are coarsely chopped to give the dip some texture.', 'Taste test, add more seasoning if desired, and enjoy!']

Title: Best Ever Vegan Nutella
Parsed_Ingredients: hazelnut soy milk refined coconut maple syrup medjool pit dutch processed pure
Directions: ['Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Spread the hazelnuts onto a baking tray and bake for 10 - 12 minutes, until lightly golden, stirring once halfway*.', 'When cooled enough to handle, pick up the hazelnuts a handful at a time and rub firmly between the palms of your hands so the skin falls off. Alternatively, the hazelnuts can be rubbed in a clean kitchen cloth. Place the peeled hazelnuts in a high-speed food processor** (ideally 600W or higher).', 'Blend on high for 4 - 5 minutes, until a nut butter consistency is formed***. Add the remaining ingredients and blend again until smooth.', 'Taste test. If you prefer a thinner consistency, consider adding more coconut oil and a touch more maple syrup and blend again. Enjoy!']

Title: Chewy No-Bake Peanut Butter Dark Chocolate Oat Bars
Parsed_Ingredients: flaxseed rolled oat medjool pit peanut butter pure rolled oat dairy chopped
Directions: ['Mix together the flaxseeds and water in a small bowl. Let sit for 5 minutes to gel.', "Transfer the flaxseed mixture and all of the other 'blended' ingredients to a food processor. Blend until well combined.", 'Add in the remaining oats and chocolate, and stir together using a spoon.', 'Press firmly into a 8 x 12 inch (20 x 30 cm) baking dish.', 'Place in the fridge for 1 hour to firm. Remove from the fridge, cut, and enjoy!']
